question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs, Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design, Trancas Canyon Park Slope Stabilization Project, Storm Drain Master Plan, Guardrail Replacement Citywide
